project.name: |-- 007-factory
project.description:
Keywords: + Functional Programming, Java 8 + Factory Pattern
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates how to implement the Factory pattern using lambdas.
BankingProductRunner: In the example, a ProductFactory is implemented using both old-school Java and Java8 features with method references and lambda. It is demonstrated that client code is not affected by the approach selected.
